revised_title: Wavefunction Picture for Direct Particle Theory of Gravitation and Electromagnetism
tldr: The authors develop a direct particle approach to the classical theory of gravitation and electromagnetism, focusing on the wavefunction picture for particles. They find that long-range gravitational forces are necessarily attractive, while very short-range forces must be repulsive. The theory differs from general relativity in its treatment of strong gravitational fields and offers new insights into the ratio of gravitational to electrical forces.
